attributes.action: To reconsider the DECC FIT review in parliament to stop 30000 job losses
attributes.background: The changes to FiTs will have a devastating effect on not just renewables industry but also the grid improvements. To effect this £12.5bn industry without consideration of the subsidy given to Nuclear, Coal or Gas requires a debate in both parliament and by the general public.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106791

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
